Imagery Description: Nude youth with drapery over both arms, holding fillet in r. hand and phiale and wreath in l., seated halfNon Sepcifieddraped woman with wreath in r. hand and mirror in l.; to r., small stele. Below the handles: female heads.
Additional Notes: The heads are close to those on the necks of nos. 380Non Sepcified1 and also to those on the hydria no. 408 below.
